MAN.TITLE: imult
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: multiplication by i the imaginary unitary

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : real or complex scalar, vector or matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: imult(x) is a more efficient way to multiply x by i than y = %i*x, without the problems occuring when x comprises "special" floating point numbers as %inf and %nan.

MAN.AUTHOR: B.P.;
